item.description:
Hi Everyone: Please see the invitation below. If you're going, you'll need to RSVP here, and also RSVP to the Mango people directly using their link at the bottom. Sounds like a lot of fun, and hey--free foodstuffs? Gotta love it! Here's the info:

 

The Mango Hometown Tour is coming to Hartford!

Thursday, August 25

special moms' luncheon at Grant's.

 

Hosted by the National Mango Board, this fun, intimate event will give local moms a chance to get together over a delicious meal - featuring mangos, of course - while learning about new, kid-friendly recipes and meal ideas

Time: Thursday, August 25, 11:30 a.m. - 1:00 p.m

Location: Grant's Restaurant and Bar, 977 Farmington Avenue, West Hartford, CT 06107

Price Chopper will also be joining the fun, so be sure to look for special mango happenings at your neighborhood store.

We’d love to have you all there!

You can reserve your spot at the luncheon here: http://mangomomshartford.eventbrite.com/

group.name: The Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Group

item.name: Free Food at Grant's! Mango Meetup
